definitions.definition: To take a long walk for pleasure or exercise.
examples: Don't forget to bring the map when we go hiking tomorrow.

definitions.definition: To unfairly or suddenly raise a price.
To snap the ball to start a play.
To lean out to the windward side of a sailboat in order to counterbalance the effects of the wind on the sails.
To pull up or tug upwards sharply.

main_definition: To take a long walk for pleasure or exercise.
secondary_definitions: To unfairly or suddenly raise a price.
( American football ) To snap the ball to start a play.
( nautical ) To lean out to the windward side of a sailboat in order to counterbalance the effects of the wind on the sails.
To pull up or tug upwards sharply.
